abstract.p: Trump Marina Casino-Hotel will present Atlantic City's first rock opera, Grendel's Lair, by Suze DiPietro and Frank Gorgo (S)

block.p: The Trump Marina Casino-Hotel, in its attempt to attract youthful visitors, will present Atlantic City's first rock opera, ''Grendel's Lair,'' written by Suze DiPietro and Frank Gorgo, starting Friday at 7 p.m. The story line has a bad-boy rocker, Vlad, losing his girlfriend, Jenny Jenny, to a new-rocker-on-the-block, Johnny Dollar. Grendel's Lair is the club where they and their acolytes hang out and it is inspired by a club of the same name that was the anchor of the South Street neighborhood of Philadelphia in the 1970's and 1980's.
